Text:
there isnt on up or down load with the sub text ... a large part of this movie is in a foreign language.. which you dont have a clue what the hell they are saying... 
it really makes a mess of a good film...

Ik zie geen ondertiteling terwijl dit er wel bij staat: "ondertiteling taal: nederlands" balen!
Hoe kan dit, en wat is er aan te doen?

Vr gr Tineke
